title: Network Science
description: Characteristics of real networks in nature and technology, network measurement methods, network analysis, evolving networks, dynamic network processes, co-evolution of structure and function.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1554 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1564 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CS 1331 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and CS 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
